task.title: Assign a User License
task.shortdesc: How to assign licenses to users

taskbody.context: How to manually assign a user license in the admin console

step.cmd: In the Admin console, go to Menu > Directory > Users.
Click the name of the user you want to manage.
Scroll down and click the userâ€™s License section.
Click any service to display the on/off switches in the Status column.
Next to a service, in the Status column, click the switch to assign or remove a license.
